channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Donating a kidney is even safer now than thought, US study shows
item.description: People who volunteer to donate a kidney face an even lower risk of death from the operation than doctors have long thought

item.title: Owners of Pulse nightclub, where 49 people died in mass shooting, won't be charged
item.description: The Orlando Police Department has closed its investigation into the former owners of the Pulse nightclub without filing any charges

item.title: Sarah Palin granted new trial in defamation lawsuit against New York Times

item.title: Dow Jones Futures Await 'Most Important' Nvidia Earnings; Buffett's Berkshire Nears $1 Trillion

item.description: The man was left to finish the 11-mile hike alone, officials said, as over a dozen coworkers began their descent.
